name: eventure-be
description: Eventure - Track the Pulse of Friendship - Microservices Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../users-service && npm install && cd ../friends-service && npm install && cd ../events-service && npm install && cd ../leaderboard-service && npm install && cd ../shared-lib && npm install

scripts.build:all: cd api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../auth-service && npm run build && cd ../users-service && npm run build && cd ../friends-service && npm run build && cd ../events-service && npm run build && cd ../leaderboard-service && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd api-gateway && npm run test && cd ../auth-service && npm run test && cd ../users-service && npm run test && cd ../friends-service && npm run test && cd ../events-service && npm run test && cd ../leaderboard-service && npm run test
scripts.lint:all: cd api-gateway && npm run lint && cd ../auth-service && npm run lint && cd ../users-service && npm run lint && cd ../friends-service && npm run lint && cd ../events-service && npm run lint && cd ../leaderboard-service && npm run lint
